scripts.build:all: pnpm -r --filter "./packages/vercel" build && pnpm -r --filter "./packages/vike-integration" build && pnpm -r --filter "./examples/*" build
scripts.build:demo: pnpm run build:all && cp -rf examples/demo/public examples/demo/.vercel .
scripts.test: pnpm run build:all && pnpm run -r test
scripts.publish:beta: changeset pre enter beta && pnpm run prepublishOnly && changeset publish -r --tag beta && changeset pre exit
